page.description: Example demonstrates an interactive world map.
page.discussion: In this example, the ViewBox has been configured to display a world map using SVG. When a country is selected, the 'value' of the ViewBox is set to the selected country, which is displayed at the top of the screen. The selected country is also given a different fill color to emphasis that it has been selected. When another country is selected, the previously selected is automatically deselected.
